entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.2°C

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this morning. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016
